flawed_nl_solution:
Nikka has 100 x 35/100 = <<100*35/100=35>>35 Chinese stamps.
She has 100 x 20/100 = <<100*20/100=500/1>>500/1 US stamps.
So, Nikka has 35 + 500/1 = <<35+500/1=535>>535 stamps that are not Japanese.
Thus, Nikka has 100 - 535 = <<100-535=-435>>-435 Japanese stamps.
#### -435

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 500/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
